'''''World Level Ascension''''' is a [[World Quest]] that increases the player's [[World Level]] to Level 9. The quest is automatically obtained upon reaching Adventure Rank 58.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|This world is about to become a more dangerous place for adventurers. Unlock new challenges, you who are ready. Ad astra abyssosque!}}
# Enter the ruins
#* Enter [[Midsummer Courtyard]]'s Quest Domain: [[World Level Ascension: Clear the Monsters in the Ruins]]
# Clear the ruins

==Rewards from the Ruins==
{{Card|Hero's Wit|10}}
{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|25}}
{{Card|Mora|200,000}}
* 1 Luxurious [[chest]]

==Enemies==
* Enemy Level: 100
* The HP of all the two Cryo Hilichurl Shooters in this challenge is increased by 20%
* The HP of all other opponents in this challenge is increased by 35%
{{Transclude|World Level Ascension: Clear the Monsters in the Ruins|Enemies}}
